https://arxiv.org/html/2505.10468v1.title: AI Agents vs. Agentic AI: A Conceptual Taxonomy, Applications and Challenges
https://arxiv.org/html/2505.10468v1.info: Comprehensive analysis of AI agent limitations including long-horizon planning failures, incomplete agentic properties, and inherited LLM limitations like hallucination and brittleness

https://phaneendrakn.medium.com/ai-chatb.title: AI Chatbot Precision: Techniques to Avoid Conversational Drift
https://phaneendrakn.medium.com/ai-chatb.info: Detailed analysis of conversational drift causes and prevention techniques including enhanced contextual understanding, user intent clarification, and feedback loops

https://medium.com/@lego17440/context-ro.title: Context Rot: The Hidden Vulnerability in AI's Long Memory
https://medium.com/@lego17440/context-ro.info: Comprehensive analysis of context rot phenomenon, attention mechanism failures, model-specific failure patterns, and hidden vulnerabilities in AI long-term memory

https://arxiv.org/html/2506.23260v1.title: From Prompt Injections to Protocol Exploits: Threats in LLM-agent Ecosystems
https://arxiv.org/html/2506.23260v1.info: Unified threat model for LLM-agent ecosystems covering prompt injection attacks, context manipulation vulnerabilities, and keyword-triggered unwanted behaviors

https://www.comm100.com/blog/top-10-chat.title: Top 10 Chatbot Fails and How to Avoid Them
https://www.comm100.com/blog/top-10-chat.info: Real-world examples of chatbot failures including Microsoft's Tay, Poncho weather bot keyword confusion, and Siri's context loss incidents

https://medium.com/@bravekjh/memory-mana.title: Memory Management for AI Agents: Principles, Architectures and Code
https://medium.com/@bravekjh/memory-mana.info: Detailed coverage of memory management principles, state persistence techniques, and best practices for long conversation handling in AI agents

https://www.manusai.io/blog/context-engi.title: Mastering Context Engineering: Six Essential Strategies for Building High-Performance AI Agents
https://www.manusai.io/blog/context-engi.info: Six core context engineering strategies including KV-cache optimization, intelligent tool masking, attention management through goal recitation, and preventing pattern lock-in

https://tech-depth-and-breadth.medium.co.title: Comparing Real-Time Communication Options: HTTP Streaming, SSE, or WebSockets for Conversational LLM Workflows
https://tech-depth-and-breadth.medium.co.info: Detailed technical comparison of HTTP Streaming, Server-Sent Events (SSE), and WebSockets for AI chat applications, including implementation details with FastAPI, pros/cons of each protocol, and specific use cases for conversational AI

https://developer.chrome.com/docs/extens.title: Content Scripts - Chrome Extensions Documentation
https://developer.chrome.com/docs/extens.info: Comprehensive technical documentation on Chrome extension content scripts, including Manifest V3 capabilities, injection methods (static, dynamic, programmatic), security guidelines, isolated worlds, and browser API access for monitoring web pages

https://medium.com/somos-pragma/an-alter.title: PostMessage API for Secure Cross-Origin Communication
https://medium.com/somos-pragma/an-alter.info: Technical guide on using postMessage API for secure cross-origin communication between windows and iframes, including security considerations for origin validation and targetOrigin parameter usage

https://github.com/browser-use/browser-u.title: Browser-Use: Enable AI to Control Your Browser
https://github.com/browser-use/browser-u.info: Open-source framework for AI agents to control web browsers and automate online tasks, including integration with various LLMs, Playwright automation, and monitoring approaches for AI browser automation

https://www.vaadata.com/blog/content-sec.title: Content Security Policy Bypass Techniques and Security Best Practices
https://www.vaadata.com/blog/content-sec.info: Detailed analysis of CSP bypass techniques including unsafe-inline exploitation, JSONP endpoint abuse, file upload bypasses, wildcard vulnerabilities, and security recommendations for strengthening CSP policies

https://www.rapidinnovation.io/post/how-.title: Ultimate Guide to Building a Real-time React Chat App in 2024
https://www.rapidinnovation.io/post/how-.info: Comprehensive technical guide covering React chat implementation patterns, WebSocket vs SSE comparison, AI integration patterns, frontend/backend architecture, performance optimization, and security considerations

https://openai.com/index/introducing-ope.title: Introducing Operator - OpenAI's Browser Automation Agent
https://openai.com/index/introducing-ope.info: Official documentation of OpenAI's Operator browser automation agent, including Computer-Using Agent (CUA) model capabilities, safety considerations, monitoring mechanisms, and web browsing AI agent architectures
